text: 2. Primitive Root Modulo 72: A number g is said to be a primitive root modulo 7 if every number coprime to 1 is a power of g modulo n. In simpler terms, if you keep i\ lale RN QAT ReTale R e LCR (LN Clag VLo [T @AW aT=Ta We [\ To [eTo M o) VA AV IVRVY I NEAVETa L (VE: 1) get all the numbers that are coprime (share no common factors other than 1) with n before you start getting repeats.
